title: Inside a Black community’s fight against Elon Musk’s supercomputer
description: Pollution from Colossal looms over a small Southern town, potentially exacerbating health concerns
content: A small, primarily Black community in Memphis is fighting back against tech giant Elon Musk, claiming a massive facility he built there is overloading an already beleaguered town with dangerous pollu… [+4321 chars]
